channel.title: Need quick lil help plz(:
channel.description: alright heres wht i need help with i keep tryin to find out how to seperate things. well i made a point system when u kill an npc it gives u points, but when i kill one npc it sends allll the sendmessages i have. when i try to use break; after all the sendMessages i get this error.

item.title: Need quick lil help plz(:
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:16, topic:386757”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=482528.msg3534098#msg3534098 date=1300416161]
You really shouldn’t give that attitude to someone who is trying to teach you something.
[/quote]
???[/quote]

[quote=“ytuio9, post:17, topic:386757”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=482528.msg3534106#msg3534106 date=1300416460]
I was talking to Ashton.
[/quote]
He probably didn’t mean to insult him or anything, was just saying he threw in the braces because people should learn instead of coming here asking for help immediately when they get something they can’t do.[/quote]

Bad programming habits are bad, no matter the level of difficulty.

Read full topic

item.title: Need quick lil help plz(:
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:10, topic:386757”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=482528.msg3533673#msg3533673 date=1300397526]
Wow that code is terrible

And you can’t just throw random breaks in there…

[code=Java]if (npcs[i].npcType == 3104) {
c.rewardPoints += 20;
c.sendMessage(“you killed corp beast heres 20 asd points”);
}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 124) {
c.rewardPoints += 2;
c.sendMessage(“you killed Earth warrior heres 2 asd points”);
}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1) {
c.rewardPoints += 2;
c.sendMessage(“you killed man heres 2 asd points”);
}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2697){
c.rewardPoints += 20;
c.sendMessage(“you killed Tormented Demond heres 20 asd points”);
}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1000){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed General Graardor heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1001){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed sergeant grimspike heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1002){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed sergeant strongstack heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1003){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed sergeant steelwill heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1012){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed commander zilyana heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1013){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Growler heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1014){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Starlight heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1015){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed bree heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1004){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed kree'arra heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1005){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed flockleader geerin heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1006){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed flight kilisa heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1007){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed wingman skree heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2882){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed dagannoth prime heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2883){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed dagannoth rex heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2881){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Supreme heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1612){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Banshee heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1643){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Infernal mage heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1613){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Nechryael heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1624){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Dust Devil heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1648) {

			c.rewardPoints += 5;
                                                         
	c.sendMessage("you killed crawling hand heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1618){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Bloodveld heres 5 asd points");
            }

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1610){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Gargoyle heres 5 asd points");

}[/code]

You need braces whenever you have two or more lines of code.
[/quote]
You don’t need all those else-statements. Using a switch-statement would look cleaner in this case.

A quick example:

switch(npcs[i].npcType) { case 3104: case 2697: case 1000: case 1012: case 2881: case 2882: case 2883: c.rewardPoints += 20; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 20 points for the kill!"); break; case 1: case 124: c.rewardPoints += 2; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 2 points for the kill!"); break; case 1001: case 1002: case 1003: case 1004: case 1005: case 1006: case 1007: case 1013: case 1014: case 1015: c.rewardPoints += 10; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 10 points for the kill!"); break; case 1610: case 1612: case 1613: case 1643: case 1624: case 1648: case 1618: c.rewardPoints += 5; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 5 points for the kill!"); break; } [/quote]
Well obviously,

Not going to take the time to redo all of that shit, Just threw in some braces for him real quick with copy & paste.

Also, With the little knowledge he has, I doubt he would know how to add a new case to it or how a switch statement even works…

Read full topic

}

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1007){

	c.sendMessage("you killed wingman skree heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2882){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed dagannoth prime heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2883){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed dagannoth rex heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2881){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Supreme heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1612){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Banshee heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1643){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Infernal mage heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1613){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Nechryael heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1624){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Dust Devil heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1648) {

			c.rewardPoints += 5;

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1618){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Bloodveld heres 5 asd points");
            }

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1610){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Gargoyle heres 5 asd points");

}[/code]

You need braces whenever you have two or more lines of code.[/quote]
You don’t need all those else-statements. Using a switch-statement would look cleaner in this case.

A quick example:

switch(npcs[i].npcType) { case 3104: case 2697: case 1000: case 1012: case 2881: case 2882: case 2883: c.rewardPoints += 20; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 20 points for the kill!"); break; case 1: case 124: c.rewardPoints += 2; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 2 points for the kill!"); break; case 1001: case 1002: case 1003: case 1004: case 1005: case 1006: case 1007: case 1013: case 1014: case 1015: c.rewardPoints += 10; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 10 points for the kill!"); break; case 1610: case 1612: case 1613: case 1643: case 1624: case 1648: case 1618: c.rewardPoints += 5; c.sendMessage("You have been rewarded 5 points for the kill!"); break; }

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1007){
c.rewardPoints += 10;

	c.sendMessage("you killed wingman skree heres 10 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2882){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed dagannoth prime heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2883){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed dagannoth rex heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2881){
c.rewardPoints += 20;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Supreme heres 20 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1612){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Banshee heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1643){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Infernal mage heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1613){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Nechryael heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1624){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Dust Devil heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1648) {

			c.rewardPoints += 5;
                                                         
	c.sendMessage("you killed crawling hand heres 5 asd points");

}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1618){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Bloodveld heres 5 asd points");
            }

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1610){
c.rewardPoints += 5;

	c.sendMessage("you killed Gargoyle heres 5 asd points");

}[/code]

You need braces whenever you have two or more lines of code.

item.title: Need quick lil help plz(:
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You cannot offer rewards for helping, so Ive removed that from your post. And like ytuio9 said, you don’t have any braces; You need to surround each if statement with brackets.
Like such:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 124) { c.rewardPoints += 2; c.sendMessage("you killed Earth warrior heres 2 asd points"); }
